original_text: He said, ‘Say this to all the people in this country and to the priests: “You lived in Babylon for many years. You ate no food and you were sad in the fifth month and in the seventh month. But you did not do this for me.
korean_text: 온 땅의 백성과 제사장들에게 이르라 너희가 칠십 년 동안 다섯째 달과 일곱째 달에 금식하고 애통하였거니와 그 금식이 나를 위하여, 나를 위하여 한 것이냐

sentences.original_text: He said, 'Say this to all the people in this country
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이르되, 이 땅의 모든 백성에게 이것을 말하라

sentences.original_text: You lived in Babylon for many years.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 여러 해 동안 바빌론에 살았다

sentences.original_text: and you were sad in the fifth month
But you did not do this for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 이것을 나를 위해 하지 않았다
